title: Hope - The Ambit of Light.
description: Heart's flame sing loud and long, bring me home with your brave song.  When a cryptic messenger reveals veiled words of prophecy, things change in Wish, forever. It is now that the High Tower Keepers are challenged with their most perilous task. Can the unicorns and the enigma of the violet flame - the Ambit of Light - save the day? www.unicornkisses.com
author: Deby Adair
